response.answer_text: Who killed Amy Winehouse?  Amy Winehouse killed Amy Winehouse. She drank herself to death. According to her father, she was working on getting sober, but had occasional periods of binge drinking. The last time, there was no one around to stop her before she overdid it.  http://washington.cbslocal.com/2013/07/16/two-years-later-what-really-caused-the-death-of-amy-winehouse-2/

Winehouse, like her contemporaries in the “27 Club,” was unable to establish stability in her life. The fame and money exacerbated her negative impulses. Only when she was working on a music project did she discipline herself. Many elements came together to create this music savant. Unfortunately, these same elements lead her down the road of alcohol poisoning. Just like Cobain and his shotgun, Brian Jones and his pool, and Robert Johnson and a jealous husband. She may have saved herself it, but it would’ve taken a superhuman effort.
